name: the-fraud
description: The Fraud - realtime multiplayer deduction game (Express + Socket.IO + React)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c cyan,magenta "npm -w server run dev" "npm -w client run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w client run build && npm -w server run build
scripts.lint: npm -w client run lint && npm -w server run lint
